articles.title: Why is Bitcoin's price at an all-time high? And how is its value determined? - The Conversation AU
articles.description: An increasing number of individuals and companies are now investing in Bitcoin, the world's largest and first fully-functioning cryptocurrency. But why? And which way is the market headed?
articles.content:
Bitcoin continues to trade close to its all-time high reached this month. Its price is now around US $34,000 up about 77% over the past month and 305% over the past year.
